content:
We can compare `int` and `double` values using relational operators.

###Relational Operators 

The operators below can be used to compare `int` and `double` values. The value of the expression will equate to a `boolean`. 

![](https://images.code.org/b0a61faf03811c0dd006c9ac6daa1f32-Screen Shot 2022-05-07 at 1.04.51 PM.png)
name: Comparing Numbers
